channel.title: Memories on Grad Student Problems
channel.description: Recent content in Memories on Grad Student Problems

item.title: Joy of Running
item.description: The running high is like having a prolonged orgasm. I have a love-hate relationship with running. At the core of it, it is an extremely repetitive act, you’re doing one thing and one thing only, but then it is this simplicity of action that puts you in a trance. If you’re like me, the time before you start running and the time at the beginning of the run is excruciating, there is just no rational reason to subject yourself to such a monotonous ordeal.

item.title: Being Alone
item.description: I came home today from the gym all sweaty and smelly and quite content. As I threw my bags on the bed and settled down, I had a great urge to open up my laptop and check something online. Lately I’ve been becoming increasing aware of this internet addiction that seems more and more unavoidable. I resisted and just laid myself down on my bed staring at the ceiling. Perhaps for the first time I noticed how beautifully the walls of my house are painted.
